entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
